ValidationRule.description: forces user to use the Action button to go through contact disqualification process rather then moving the stage manually.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Lifecycle_Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Lifecycle_Stage__c, "Disqualified"), NOT(ISCHANGED(FlowToggle__c)), NOT( $Profile.Name = "Salesforce API Only System Integrations" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use the Disqualify Contact button to update the contact stage to Disqualified.
